import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "./App.css"; import Cleave from "cleave.js/react"; const normalizeCardNumber = (value) => { return value.replace(/\s/g, "").match(/.{1,4}/g)?.join(" ").substr(0, 19) || "" } const normalizeCVC = (value) => { return value.substr(0, 3) || "" } const axios = require('axios').default; const [cardHolder, setcardHolder] = useState('') export class App extends Component { submitPayment() { axios({ method: 'post', url: '/', data: { cardHolder: cardHolder } }); } render() { return

URFU Payment

setcardHolder(event.target.value)} />
{ const { value } = event.target event.target.value = normalizeCardNumber(value) } } />
{ const { value } = event.target event.target.value = normalizeCVC(value) } } />
} } export default App;
